item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 02/13/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ February 13, 2023
On this first episode of our new Liberty Dispatch NEW BRIEF, hosts Andrew DeBartolo updates Canadians on the news they need to know, both here, at home, and around the globe. 

[Segment 1] - Candian Media Debacles (ArriveCan Corruption & Bailout Bell Bails Out):
"Federal report alleges deleted emails, bribes as part of ArriveCAN boondoggle" | Rebel News: https://www.rebelnews.com/federal_report_alleges_deleted_emails_bribes_as_part_of_arrivecan_boondoggle;
"Execs: ArriveCAN collected $340,000 bonuses" | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/02/08/execs-arrivecan-collected-340000-bonuses;
"Bell to lay off 9 percent workforce" | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/02/08/bell-to-lay-off-9-percent-workforce;

[Segment 2] - Trudeau and Poilievre Under the Gun:
"Trudeau denies inviting Nazi soldier to Zelensky reception, claims Ukrainian Canadian Congress is being attacked" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/trudeau-denies-inviting-nazi-soldier-to-zelensky-reception-claims-ukrainian-canadian-congress-is-being-attacked?utm_content=;
Tweet from Rebel News: https://twitter.com/RebelNewsOnline/status/1756000384085000333;
Tweet from The Post Millennial: https://twitter.com/TPostMillennial/status/1755321145149067371;
"Poilievre: Indigenous leaders partner up to 'Make Canada Great Again'" | The Post Millennial: https://thepostmillennial.com/poilievre-indigenous-leaders-partner-up-to-make-canada-great-again?utm_content=;
"Pierre Poilievre says he is against the use of puberty blockers for transgender minors" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/pierre-poilievre-says-he-is-against-the-use-of-puberty-blockers-for-transgender-minors;
Tweet from Stephanie Ha: https://twitter.com/stephanie_ha/status/1755249806279127465;

[Segment 3] -Canadian News Clean-up:
"Cost of Liberals' affordability retreat rises to $500k" | National Post: https://nationalpost.com/news/politics/cost-liberals-affordability-retreat-rises-500k;
"Conservatives fail in final Commons effort to stop new trade deal with China" | The Globe and Mail: https://www.theglobeandmail.com/politics/article-conservatives-fail-in-final-commons-effort-to-stop-new-trade-deal-with;
"Minister pissed off on Gaza" | Blacklocks: https://www.blacklocks.ca/minister-pissed-off-on-gaza;
"Alberta rejects emissions cap" | True North: https://tnc.news/2024/02/06/alberta-rejects-emissions-cap;
"As planet warms, ferocious snowfalls like the one that hit Nova Scotia could increase" | CTV News Atlantic: https://atlantic.ctvnews.ca/as-planet-warms-ferocious-snowfalls-like-the-one-that-hit-nova-scotia-could;

item.title: Haunted Cosmos: Some praise and a warning [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description:
After the popularity of our Biblical Cosmology series in the fall last year, Pootie finally plays catch up listening to the Haunted Cosmos and the Rebels nerd out on the unhinged.

There is an immense value in Christians understanding what the Bible has to say about the unseen realm, but pastorally P Nate wanted to issue a warning that this is an important secondary issue in scripture that can sometimes become dangerous if we make a secondary storyline THE storyline.
item.author: Pastors Nate & Chris - The Rebels

item.title: TCND: Freedom from People Pleasing (Christians Bad, Non-Christians Good) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
Hey, Neighbor, we're recording on Superbowl Sunday...  not to be confused with Tuesdays with Taylor...

(By the way, are you the Master of your own Sea?)

Then: Not only do Christians like to identify as "Sinners," but we like to sanitize the behavior of the Unbelievers. We want to give them the benefit of the doubt--even though they are Lost.

Later: We tried to raise Luke's bloodpressure with the story of a grumpy patient complaining about her stay at the hospital.  But he is pretty unflappable.   

Do you know what the medical community does with particularly uncooperative patients?

Finally: Let's talk about the idol of People Pleasing.  What IS the difference between having a "servant's heart" and being a people-pleaser?

Contact the comedian's family: nextdoor@johnbranyan.com
item.author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Ep. 71: How to Pursue Marriage and Relationships in a Biblical Way [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: The topic of discussion for this episode can be summed up by the iconic quote from the movie The Princess Bride, “Mawwige is what bwings us together today.” On this Valentine’s Day special, host Joseph Backholm is joined by Jamie Dunlop, a local pastor at Capitol Hill Baptist Church. Jaime frequently guides newly engaged couples through pre-marital counseling and has himself been married for 23 years. He addresses the godly design of marriage and the intentional purpose of its creation: to bring God glory. He also dives into the reasons that many people pursue marriage and how to discern if you are pursuing self or pursuing the Lord when seeking out relationships.
item.author: Joseph Backholm
item.itunes:author: Joseph Backholm

item.title: Political Theology with Timon Cline! [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Today the Pugs are joined by the Executive Editor of American Reformer, Timon Cline. Timon is a lawyer, and a writer, and a deep thinker about the political implications of the Christian faith. Political theology might be a new term for you, and if you had a public school education--and even a certain form of Christian education--the term might even seem sinister to you. But hopefully by the time the conversation is done you'll see that Christianity is public truth and that necessarily means it has political applications.

 

Follow American Reformer: https://americanreformer.org/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Deanna McLeod: OHIP Billing Data Reveals SHOCKING Truths!!! [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ February 10, 2023
Once again, Mike is joined by Canadian Covid Care Alliance (CCCA) clinical researcher Deanna McLeod, founder of Kaleidoscope Strategic and Covid Sense, to discuss what the Ontario Health Insurance Plan (OHIP) data reveals about the COVID-19 jab. YOU'RE NOT GOING TO WANT TO MISS THIS ONE!!!

item.title: Christ Preached to Cannibals - The Beauty & Power of The Gospel [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
They guys are joined by Missionary Ben to talk about John G. Paton and his perseverance on the island of Tanna. 

 

 

B.F. Westen (Ben) was deported from China in 2018 after serving as a missionary for fifteen years in Gansu Province.  

 

His passion is to help Christians pray more strategically for China (PrayforChina.us), while also helping to mobilize a new generation of missionaries from both Latin America and the English speaking world (PrayGiveGo.us).

 

He has blogged on missions since 2006 (chinacall.substack.com) and tweeted (mostly to himself) since 2009 (@chinaadventures). One of his early articles (My Burden For The Truly Unreached) was featured in a well-known John Piper sermon (Holy Ambition: Paul’s and Yours). 

 

He is the editor of a new edition of the classic biography of millionaire missionary William Borden (BordenofYale.com - Jan 1, 2024), who shared his burden for China’s Gansu Province. 

 

He is currently working on numerous writing projects, including a reboot of his first book, Unbeaten, about being arrested, interrogated, and deported from China (Unbeaten.vip).  

 

And last but not least, a book about the perseverance of John G. Paton on the island of Tanna, which he hopes to release on the 200th Anniversary of Paton's birth: May 24, 2024 (JohnGPaton.com).    

 

Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America)

https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/  

   

Missions Conference 2024 at Christ Church 

https://www.christkirk.com/missions-2024/
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Lessons for the Dominion Mandate from Recent Pro-Abortion Victories [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: The United States Supreme Court’s abortion jurisprudence got better with the reversal of Roe v. Wade last summer. So, why, if the “law” got better at the constitutional level is the law in the states getting worse than under Roe’s abortion regime? David tackles that question using observations by Choc Knox, Jason Farley, and George Grant. The answer may surprise you.
item.author: FLF, LLC
item.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Ep. 70: David Bahnsen on a Biblical Perspective of Work and Rest [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
God cares about the work because he cares about the worker. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by David Bahnsen, founder, managing partner, and chief investment officer of The Bahnsen Group a national private wealth management group. In his recently released book, Full-Time: Work and the Meaning of Life, David discusses how Christians should view work, rest, and retirement. In today’s culture, we dream about the day we no longer have to work – but is that mindset biblical? Give this episode a listen to learn more about current job trends, the purpose behind our work, and how to think biblically about the jobs we do.

Resources

  • Full-Time: Work and the Meaning of Life by David Bahnsen
item.author: Joseph Backholm

item.title: Alberta Trans Ban: The Good, The Bad, & The Ugly [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ February 08, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew unpack the recent announcement by Alberta Premier Danielle Smith on their proposal to "ban" medical intervention for minors.

[Segment 1] - Danielle Smith and the NEW Alberta Trans Policy:
Tweet from Danielle Smith: https://twitter.com/ABDanielleSmith/status/1752814944716734935;
"Alberta announces parental rights policy protecting kids from the worst of transgender ideology" | LifeSiteNews: https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/alberta-announces-parental-rights-policy-protecting-kids-from-the-worst-of-transgender-ideology;

[Segment 2] - The Response from Progressive Legislators:

item.title: Ep. 69: Aaron Renn on Life in a Negative World [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: Anyone can tell you how the world has changed, but no one can predict what exactly the future holds. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Aaron Renn author of Life in a Negative World: Confronting Challenges in an Anti-Christian Culture. In his book, Aaron unpacks the changes in society's perspective and acceptance of Christianity. He catalogs three periods of decline: the positive, the neutral, and the negative world. He also analyses how three different types of evangelicals have responded and will respond to the changes in culture. There is no set guideline on how to navigate this negative world but listen now on what can be done and how you can live according to the truths of scripture.

item.title: The Alistair Begg Controversy And The Moscow Mood [The Rebel Podcast]
item.description: Everybody's heard about Alistair Begg's advice to a grandmother about attending her grandkid's trans gay wedding.  Many have responded, and some people say that some of the responses have been harsh.  The Rebels weigh in on this issue today - not so much the Begg advice issue itself, rather the criticism of harshness.  What would Jesus say?!

On this first episode of our new Liberty Dispatch NEW BRIEF, hosts Andrew DeBartolo updates Canadians on the news they need to know, both here, at home, and around the globe.

item.itunes:author: Mark Dewey

item.title: TCND: Peaches the She-Devil (and Luke's Zit) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
We have an extra guest at the table today, Neighbor! 

Also, John's sons-in-law created a video game character who is almost indescribably ugly.  But we try anyway.

Either way--let's get down to business...  Transformers and electronic tablets are for Christians/Saints--not for Sinners.

Boy, this is a controversial topic in our community right now.  Is it wise to refer to Christians as "Sinners saved by grace?"  

The Peaches really feels encouraged, because she was called a "she-devil" several times.  What inspired that kind of vitriol? It was the suggestion (no--insistence) that being a Saint who struggles with sin is very different from continuing to identify with your sin by calling yourself a "sinner."  

Saying "I am a sinner" is an identity statement.  One person told us, "I was a sinner, I am a sinner, and it's what I ALWAYS WILL BE."   Yuck.  That comes from unthoughtful church culture--not from God's Word.  The power of the Gospel is completely removed when Christians still cling to their sinful identity. God calls us Children (He calls us Saints). But Americans still call themselves "Sinners."

Later: Listen to some truly unhinged accusations from really, really angry people.

Email the Comedian's Family at nextdoor@johnbranyan.com.

item.title: The Lies of Our Anti-Christian Age: An Interview with Rosaria Butterfield [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Today the Pugs are a little short-handed--Tom isn't feeling well. But we do have Rosaria Butterfield with us to discuss her new book, Five Lies of Our Anti-Christian Age. It was a wonderful and free-ranging discussion that touched on many things, among them the subject of what time it is. And while it was a sober assessment on the sorry state of Big Eva and the heretical trends in that world, it was hopeful because of the invincible Christ of the Gospel. Tune in and enjoy the show!

 

Order Rosaria’s book, Five Lies of Our Anti-Christian Age: https://rosariabutterfield.com/five-lies

 

Check out Rosaria’s recent Convocation talk at Liberty University: https://www.youtube.com/live/iEtQ-z9o9_I?si=coYfh8GAAB6sFHYS&t=2021

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Ep. 68: Taylor Swift & The Influence of Music [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
She’s tall, she’s blonde, she has over one billion fans – who is it? Taylor Swift. This one-woman show has been sweeping the entertainment industry, even the NFL. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by worldview expert David McDonald and The Washington Stand’s resident gen-Z Rachael Woods to dissect the lyrics of one of the many famous songs by Taylor Swift. Having such a reach and influence over many generations, the question arises: What exactly is Taylor singing about and how is this affecting younger generations? Whether you are a Swiftie or parent to a Swiftie, listen now to learn more about her appeal and songwriting! 

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. Published by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Family Research Council⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠.

item.title: 141: Trans Wars [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Dr. Aaron Rock speaks to the growing acceptance and practice of transgenderism: what is really at the heart of this movement, and how it's detrimental to society and an offence to God.

 

More Resources:

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/

Beachhead Media YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTRwY4I8_rSQ7Z6I05k8lkA
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: Matthew 28:18 [Up and Ready]
item.author: Mark Dewey
item.itunes:author: Mark Dewey

item.title: Holding the Military Accountable - Brad Miller & Davis Younts [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Holding the military accountable in the higher ranks, even after retirement? A Declaration of Military Accountability was signed, what happens now? The guys are joined by Brad Miller and Davis Younts to talk about it. 

 

For more Brad Miller 

https://lnk.bio/Brad_Miller 

 

More from R. Davis Younts 

https://yountslaw.com/ 

 

Sign up for The FLF Conference 2024 (Prodigal America)

https://flfnetwork.com/prodigal-america/

https://www.christkirk.com/missions-2024/ 

 

For the Declaration of Military Accountability: https://www.docdroid.com/zwy8Bmx/declaration-of-military-accountability-pdf 

 

Pub Members catch the backstage here:  https://pubtv.flfnetwork.com/tabs/none/videos/27006
